description:
Hiro and Shin splendidly defeat the Nidhogg and receive a warm reception from the village. Next they are asked to escort a group of peddlers from Mino Village to Mysen Town. On the way, Meat-Mania comes attacking.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mata Hitori Hen na no ga Kita!
また1人ヘンなのが来た!
